extendedInfo.description: GO Launcher Notification is an independent plugin of GO Launcher EX. It can help you to be notified the number of unread messages for more than 20 application like calls, SMS, Gmail, Facebook , K9mail, etc . When you get any missed calls or messages, it would show the total number of them on the icon.INFOï¼	Facebook has updated the SDK on October 19. With this new SDK, facebook will not inform us after messages have been read.So the notification won't be reduced immediately.Developers are working on this.Features:- Support for missed calls, unread SMS, Facebook, Twitter, Gmail, Whatsapp, Viber, Kakao Talk, Viber, Google Talk, Native Mailbox, Skype, Yahoo Mail, Hotmail, WeChat.- Support icons on dock bar, home screen and app drawer.- Independent plugin- Be compatible with GO Launcher HDImportant:1. This is a totally free application and we need the permissions to read the applications, but we will not collect the messages.2. Latest version of GO Launcher EX is required. (Search "GO Launcher EX" to download)3. To apply the notification: MENU> Plugins> Notification

reviews.title: Note II!!!
reviews.comment: Works like a charm!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Extra apps don\'t work with nexus 4
reviews.comment: I can\'t turn on the accessibility feature the program wants because it does not exist on nexus 4. Not sure what else to do. All I see is a bunch of options for the impaired. Looking fwd to the new update. I  am running android 4.2 and go launcher 4. Even with the updates I don\'t see the accessibility option for notifications.
reviews.author: Misagh M

reviews.title: reid
reviews.comment: I have tried over and over again to make this work. It says go to the accessibility section to use it for other applications but not mater how hard I try I cannot get it to work. Many articles have been written about this but I cant get to any of the screen shots they show. I agree with Cindy T\'s review, how do I change accessibility? Where are the setup instructions??
reviews.author: Simon Reid

reviews.title: Kind of works!
reviews.comment: Not too bad, but doesnt seem to work with Whatsapp on Samsung GS4. Otherwise a handy addition
reviews.author: Ste Watkinson

reviews.title: Not compatible in 3D mode
reviews.comment: Only works if you are NOT in 3D core beta mode. Other than that I have been a GO user for years and swear by you guys!!!
reviews.author: manda jackson

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work!
reviews.comment: This app worked initially but new only shows text notifications. Tried reinstalling but didn\'t work. Tried to email them and it bounced!
reviews.author: Olly Kiff

reviews.title: Gmail still showing new messages
reviews.comment: The gmail app still shows I have 3 new messages, was working fine til I did the update. I have unistalled and reinstalled, still showing 3 new messages....
reviews.author: Patrick Kemper

reviews.title: Little improvement
reviews.comment: Now the accessibility showing.  But still not working. Please fix..
reviews.author: Nikko Yuvonda

reviews.comment: Love it but I cannot find in accessibility on S4.  I got the update but cannot find how to change accessibilty.  HELP!!!\tUsed this app on my HTC Rezound but then tried it with my Galaxy S4 And it won\'t work.  How can I change the accessibility??
reviews.author: Cindy T.

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: After checking an email and deleating it, the notification count reappears! Facebpok notifications doesn\'t always appear Please fix
reviews.author: Hani Touma

reviews.title: Gmail Notification Broken
reviews.comment: It appears that if a user sets up the new Gmail \"Tab\" system, then this app doesn\'t appear to be able to read the \'Primary\' tab at all.  Other notification apps such as \"Missed It\" had an update which allowed them to function, however this notification app still hasn\'t updated as of this review.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good! But...
reviews.comment: It\'s not showing notifications for GO SMS Pro. It\'d get 4 stars if this is fixed and if it is available also for many other applications! O:-)
reviews.author: Bharath B.M

reviews.comment: Its a nice app. I would rate it higher if it were able to give games notifications as well.
reviews.author: Bree Wehmeyer

reviews.title: not working
reviews.comment: When I have no new text messages, it shows the notification badge number 6... and when I get a new text, the number turns to 7. So basically the base is set at 6........ Very...very...inconvenient. Tried uninstalling and reinstalling. Nothing is fixing. I\'m using samsung galaxy s4 btw.
reviews.author: Su Min

reviews.title: Not working HTC ONE
reviews.comment: This is just not working at all with my new HTC ONE I turned on notification is accessibility and restarted the phone but still nothing. I\'ll give it a better rating once this is fixed.  Cheers.
reviews.author: Ryan Raymond

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: This is not working.  It\'s not visible in accessibility to turn on. Go Launcher\'s replies to others who are having this issue assume that it is available in settings. It\'s not.  I\'ve been using and enjoying go launcher but this is a deal breaker.  Going to try Nova Launcher.
reviews.author: Mike Kimble

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Only three app show up calls,msg and gmail pls fix
reviews.author: Mohammed Kinkhabwala

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work for all apps...
reviews.comment: I have the s4 and it only works for email, missed calls, and text. I wished it would work for my katalk and facebook. I tried going to accessibility and made sure my notification services is on and tried reinstalling this app too. Any one else having this problem with the s4 phone? :/
reviews.author: pinkcrystalS2

reviews.title: Only displays facebook notifications
reviews.comment: I\'ve used this plug in before and worked fine.  I recently reinstalled it and now it\'s only showing facebook notifications. All other are not showing at all.
reviews.author: Juanra Hernandez

reviews.title: Good program
reviews.comment: Hi!  This wery good prog. Made some problem on my Galaxy S4 with Android 4.2.2 onboard. The problem will appeard after notification enebling in wery strange place - GALERY. My photos will not open for big (full screen) size at all and video not hide buttons on playing. Please fix this problem and 5 will place 5 star rewiew. Thank you!
reviews.author: ilya s
